original: Börjeson, Lars Erik Wilhelm, läns-notarie, Kalmar, f. 28/10/98 i Örby, Älvsb. L, av Albert B. o. Ebba Evers. G. 32 m. Märta Edgren. Barn: Lars-Erik f. 33, Lena 40: — Stud:ex. 17, jur. kand. 23. Andre o. förste not. i Själevads o. Arnäs doms. 23-25, tf. domhav. 25, bitr. länsnot. h. länsstyr. i Jämtl. 1. sed. 26, e. o. länsnot. 31, tf. länsnot. av första kl. h. länsstyr. i Kalmar 1. 35, länsnot. av andra kl. sed. 38, länsnot. av första kl. v. länsstyr. i Kalmar 1. sed. 41. Kontr:- o. rev:-uppdr., allm. omb. h. bostadskredit-fören., h. sparbank, led. av styr. f. Kalmar 1. skyddsfören., suppl. i styr. f. KFUM i Kalmar.
translated: Börjeson, Lars Erik Wilhelm, county secretary, Kalmar, born on October 28, 1898 in Örby, Älvsborg County, son of Albert B. and Ebba Evers. Married in 1932 to Märta Edgren. Children: Lars-Erik born in 1933 and Lena born in 1940. He passed his high school exam in 1917 and his law degree in 1923. He served as the second and first notary in Själevads and Arnäs municipal courts from 1923 to 1925, acting judge in 1925, assistant county secretary in the county government of Jämtland from 1926 to 1931, extra county secretary in 1931, acting first class county secretary in the county government of Kalmar from 1935 to 1938, county secretary of the second class since 1938 in the county government of Kalmar. He worked as an auditor and reviewer and as a general representative for the housing credit association and the savings bank. He was a board member for Kalmar's protective association and a substitute board member for the YMCA in Kalmar.

workExperience.name: County Government of Kalmar
workExperience.jobTitle: County Secretary of the Second Class
